Scenario: As you begin to develop the program for your organization, you assess the corporate culture and determine that there is a pervasive opinion that the security program only slows things down and limits the performance of the `real workers.`
Which group of people should be consulted when developing your security program?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Checking Scope is most important

Selected Answer: A
In project management, scope verification is crucial, especially when projects are behind schedule and over budget. Scope verification ensures that the project includes all the work required, and only the work required, to complete the project successfully.

Scope Verification: Checking the project scope helps identify if there have been any scope changes or scope creep, which can often lead to delays and budget overruns. Ensuring that the project scope is well-defined and agreed upon by all stakeholders helps keep the project focused and aligned with its original objectives.

The new CISO was informed of all the Information Security projects that the organization has in progress. Two projects are over a year behind schedule and over budget. Using best business practices for project management you determine that the project correctly aligns with the company goals.
Which of the following needs to be performed NEXT?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Setting controls to meet the stricter regulation or standard ensures that your organization is compliant with all applicable regulations and standards. By adhering to the most stringent requirements, you effectively cover the less strict requirements as well, ensuring comprehensive compliance. This approach reduces the risk of non-compliance and potential legal and financial penalties.

Selected Answer: D
The question is clear "When multiple regulations or standards apply to your industry..." so the answer is D. If you don't implement the stricter one, you will be out of compliance and subject to whatever the fines are.

Probably the correct answer is
Implement the easiest regulations FIRST.
I vote for the correct answer -> B Recommendations of your Legal Staff
If you implement the easiest, you break the others stricter regulations. Correct answer is D

choices.C: Easiest regulation or standard to implement

Scenario: A Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) recently had a third party conduct an audit of the security program. Internal policies and international standards were used as audit baselines. The audit report was presented to the CISO and a variety of high, medium and low rated gaps were identified.
